name: An Unearthly Child
desc: Two school teachers' curiosity leads them to an old box in a junkyard.

name: The Daleks
desc: The TARDIS lands the Doctor, Susan, Ian and Barbara on Skaro.

name: The Edge of Destruction
desc: The TARDIS falters. The Doctor, Susan, Ian and Barbara turn on each other.

name: Marco Polo
desc: The TARDIS lands in Central Asia where the travellers meet Marco Polo.

name: The Keys of Marinus
desc: The crew undertakes a series of dangerous quests to find the keys of Marinus.

name: The Aztecs
desc: The travellers land in an Aztec tomb and get cut off from the TARDIS.

name: The Sensorites
desc: The TARDIS lands inside a spaceship orbiting the planet Sense-Sphere.

name: The Reign of Terror
desc: The Doctor and his companions become embroiled in the French Revolution.

name: Planet of Giants
desc: The TARDIS doors open before too early causing it and everyone inside to shrink.

name: The Dalek Invasion of Earth
desc: Ian and Barbara are happy to back in London, until the Daleks arrive.

name: The Rescue
desc: Two humans are stranded on the planet Dido.

name: The Romans
desc: The Doctor and his friends take a holiday to Nero's Rome.

name: The Web Planet
desc: The TARDIS is dragged to the bug planet Vortis, which is at war.

name: The Crusade
desc: The TARDIS lands in Palestine where King Richard the Lionheart wages war.

name: The Space Museum
desc: The TARDIS lands on Xeros where the travellers see their future.

name: The Chase
desc: The Daleks have built a space/time vehicle and are in pursuit of the Doctor.

name: The Time Meddler
desc: The Doctor faces one of his own race; who is trying to alter earth's history.

name: Galaxy 4
desc: The TARDIS lands on a barren world where the travellers encounter the Drahvins.

name: Mission to the Unknown
desc: A Space Security Service agent arrives on the planet Kembel, hunting Daleks.

name: The Myth Makers
desc: The TARDIS materialises on the plains beyond the besieged city of Troy.

name: The Daleks' Master Plan
desc: The Doctor battles the Daleks across spacetime in this epic tale.

name: The Massacre of St Bartholomew's Eve
desc: The TARDIS takes the Doctor and Steven to Paris in 1572.

name: The Ark
desc: The TARDIS travels to a giant spacecraft in the far future.

name: The Celestial Toymaker
desc: The Doctor and his companions meet the immortal Celestial Toymaker.

name: The Gunfighters
desc: The Doctor is barely involved in the gun fight at the OK Corral.

name: The Savages
desc: The TARDIS arrives on a world with a seemingly utopian society.

name: The War Machines
desc: A worldwide computer system takes over and decides to wipe out humanity.

name: The Smugglers
desc: The TARDIS takes the Doctor and his new companions, Ben and Polly, to Cornwall.

name: The Tenth Planet
desc: The Doctor regenerates after his battle with the Cybermen.

name: The Power of the Daleks
desc: In the Second Doctor's debut, he must defeat the Daleks on Vulcan.

name: The Highlanders
desc: As the battle of Culloden has come to an end, the TARDIS arrives in Scotland.

name: The Underwater Menace
desc: The time travellers are taken prisoner on a volcanic island.

name: The Moonbase
desc: The Doctor and company arrive on the moon in 2070 but the Cybermen are waiting.

name: The Macra Terror
desc: The TARDIS lands on a human colony world where everyone appears to be happy.

name: The Faceless Ones
desc: The TARDIS arrives in the landing path of a plane at Gatwick airport.

name: The Evil of the Daleks
desc: Battle rages from Victorian England to Skaro where the Daleks seem finished.

name: The Tomb of the Cybermen
desc: An archealogical dig on Telos investigates the long-dead Cybermen.

name: The Abominable Snowmen
desc: The Doctor is delighted when the TARDIS returns him to the Himalayas in 1935.

name: The Ice Warriors
desc: The Doctor arrives on Earth during a new ice age and meets the Ice Warriors.

name: The Enemy of the World
desc: The Doctor discovers he has a double: a powerful politician called Salamander.

name: The Web of Fear
desc: The Yeti invade London, and we meet Colonel Lethbridge-Stewart.

name: Fury from the Deep
desc: The TARDIS lands on the sea near the coast of England.

name: The Wheel in Space
desc: The TARDIS lands on a small spaceship where the Doctor is attacked by a Robot.

name: The Dominators
desc: A Dominator spacecraft lands on the peaceful world of Dulkis.

name: The Mind Robber
desc: Escaping a volcano, the Doctor takes the TARDIS out of normal spacetime.

name: The Invasion
desc: The travellers land in London where they help find computer scientist Watkins.

name: The Krotons
desc: The TARDIS takes the Doctor, Jamie and Zoe to a world where they meet the Gonds.

name: The Seeds of Death
desc: The TARDIS arrives on Earth where T-Mat has revolutionised travel.

name: The Space Pirates
desc: The Doctor, Jamie and Zoe find themselves inside a space beacon.

name: The War Games
desc: In the Second Doctor's swansong, the TARDIS lands in the Great War.

name: Spearhead from Space
desc: After regenerating, the Doctor begins his exile on Earth by battling Autons.

name: Doctor Who and the Silurians
desc: The Doctor and UNIT are called in when a research centre experiences problems.

name: The Ambassadors of Death
desc: Contact has been lost with Mars Probe 7 on its return journey to Earth.

name: Inferno
desc: UNIT have been assigned to provide security for an experimental operation.

name: Terror of the Autons
desc: The Master breaks into a museum and steals a Nestene energy globe.

name: The Mind of Evil
desc: At Stangmoor Prison, the Doctor and Jo observe the Keller Machine.

name: The Claws of Axos
desc: An spaceship lands on Earth. In exchange for fuel, its crew gifts Earth.

name: Colony in Space
desc: The Master has stolen the Time Lord files for a devastating Doomsday Weapon.

name: The Dæmons
desc: The Doctor watches a televised archaeological dig near Devil's End.

name: Day of the Daleks
desc: The world is on the brink of war and Sir Reginald Styles has to negotiate peace.

name: The Curse of Peladon
desc: The stormy world of Peladon is at a pivotal moment in history.

name: The Sea Devils
desc: The Doctor and Jo visit the Master on a prison island.

name: The Mutants
desc: The TARDIS takes the Doctor and Jo to the Skybase station orbiting planet Solos.

name: The Time Monster
desc: A dream of the Master and a glowing crystal leads the Doctor to Earth.

name: The Three Doctors
desc: Gel creatures materialise around UNIT HQ and commence a full scale attack.

name: Carnival of Monsters
desc: The TARDIS lands on a ship in a bottle.

name: Frontier in Space
desc: The TARDIS lands in a future where Earth and Draconia are on the brink of war.

name: Planet of the Daleks
desc: On the jungle planet of Spiridon, the Doctor and Jo join forces with the Thals.

name: The Green Death
desc: The Doctor and Jo discover that an old mine is infested with giant maggots.

name: The Time Warrior
desc: Sarah Jane Smith & the Sontarans debut in this adventure in medieval England.

name: Invasion of the Dinosaurs
desc: Landing in London the Doctor and Sarah are puzzled to find the city deserted.

name: Death to the Daleks
desc: The TARDIS is drained of power and stranded on planet Exxilon.

name: The Monster of Peladon
desc: The TARDIS returns the Doctor to Peladon fifty years after his last visit.

name: Planet of the Spiders
desc: Giant Spiders and Mike Yates feature in the Third Doctor's swansong.

name: Robot
desc: After his regeneration, the Doctor investigates the robbery of top secret plans.

name: The Ark in Space
desc: The TARDIS materialises aboard the Ark, a space station orbiting Earth.

name: The Sontaran Experiment
desc: The crew arrive on a distant future Earth which is now a desolate wilderness.

name: Genesis of the Daleks
desc: The Time Lords send the Doctor to stop the Daleks conquering the Universe.

name: Revenge of the Cybermen
desc: The time ring returns the Doctor, Sarah and Harry to space station Nerva.

name: Terror of the Zygons
desc: Oil rigs off Scotland are being attacked by the Loch Ness monster.

name: Planet of Evil
desc: The TARDIS picks up a distress call so the Doctor and Sarah go to investigate.

name: Pyramids of Mars
desc: In England, 1911, the Doctor and Sarah encounter Sutekh, last of the Osirans.

name: The Android Invasion
desc: The Doctor and Sarah arrive on present day Earth. Or do they?

name: The Brain of Morbius
desc: The TARDIS lands on wreckage-strewn Karn where Dr Solon gives the crew shelter.

name: The Seeds of Doom
desc: An alien pod has been found and the Doctor rushes to investigate.

name: The Masque of Mandragora
desc: In 15th Century Italy, the Doctor & Sarah save Earth from the Mandragora Helix.

name: The Hand of Fear
desc: The Doctor & Sarah Jane battle a fossilised alien hand. Eldrad must live.

name: The Deadly Assassin
desc: The Doctor is framed for the assassination of the retiring Time Lord president.

name: The Face of Evil
desc: The TARDIS lands in an alien jungle with a savage tribe: the Sevateem.

name: The Robots of Death
desc: The TARDIS lands on a huge sandminer as it travels across a barren landscape.

name: The Talons of Weng-Chiang
desc: The Doctor and Leela are attacked by stage performers in Victorian London.

name: Horror of Fang Rock
desc: The keepers of the lonely Fang Rock lighthouse start disappearing in the fog.

name: The Invisible Enemy
desc: Ill, the Doctor is injected into his own body to fight the infection.

name: Image of the Fendahl
desc: The TARDIS is drawn to Fetch Priory where Professor Fendelman experiments.

name: The Sun Makers
desc: Arriving on Pluto, the Doctor is surprised to find it has breathable air.

name: Underworld
desc: The TARDIS lands on a spacecraft piloted by the survivors of the planet Minyos.

name: The Invasion of Time
desc: The Sontarans invade Gallifrey and the Doctor constructs the Demat Gun.

name: The Ribos Operation
desc: To restore cosmic balance, the White Guardian requires the Key to Time.

name: The Pirate Planet
desc: The second segment of the Key is on the Planet Calufrax, which is missing.

name: The Stones of Blood
desc: Druids await the Docter on the Boscombe Moore.

name: The Androids of Tara
desc: In search of the fourth segment of the Key to Time, the TARDIS lands on Tara.

name: The Power of Kroll
desc: In search of the fifth segment of the Key to Time, Romana is taken by Swampies.

name: The Armageddon Factor
desc: In search of the final segment of the Key to Time, the TARDIS lands on Atrios.

name: Destiny of the Daleks
desc: The TARDIS lands on Skaro, but it is no longer abandoned.

name: City of Death
desc: Time starts slipping as the Doctor shows Romana around Paris.

name: The Creature from the Pit
desc: After a distress call, the Doctor & Romana land on the jungle world Chloris.

name: Nightmare of Eden
desc: The Doctor, Romana & K9 arrive on the Empress and meet the scientist Tryst.

name: The Horns of Nimon
desc: The Nimon has promised the rulers of the planet Skonnos advanced technology.

name: The Leisure Hive
desc: After a disappointing holiday by the sea, the Doctor and Romana go to Argolis.

name: Meglos
desc: At the invitation of an old friend, Zastor, the Doctor goes to Tigella.

name: Full Circle
desc: On Alzarius the Doctor & Romana discover the descendants of a crashed starliner.

name: State of Decay
desc: Trapped in E-Space, the TARDIS lands on a world where three Lords rule.

name: Warriors' Gate
desc: The TARDIS is drawn to an empty void by Biroc, a time sensitive Tharil.

name: The Keeper of Traken
desc: The Master threatens the peaceful world of Traken.

name: Logopolis
desc: Warned of his own death, the Doctor must save the universe from the Master.

name: Castrovalva
desc: The newly regenerated Doctor tries to avoid destruction within Event One.

name: Four to Doomsday
desc: The Doctor meets Monarch who believes he will meet a god at the start of time.

name: Kinda
desc: On the planet Deva Loka a primitive tribe, the Kinda, hides a dark secret.

name: The Visitation
desc: The Doctor must stop a trio of Terileptil convicts wiping out the human race.

name: Black Orchid
desc: The Cranleigh house is hiding dark secrets, including one in a locked room.

name: Earthshock
desc: The Doctor discovers a bomb powerful enough to destroy the Earth.

name: Time-Flight
desc: The Doctor discovers that aeroplanes have been drawn back in time by the Master.

name: Arc of Infinity
desc: Omega has returned and sworn revenge on Gallifrey.

name: Snakedance
desc: The Mara, still hiding within Tegan's subconscious, wants to be reborn.

name: Mawdryn Undead
desc: The Black Guardian employs Turlough to kill the Doctor.

name: Terminus
desc: Terminus is the refuge of plague victims, dumped there by an uncaring Company.

name: Enlightenment
desc: The Eternals are having a space race, but one works for the Black Guardian.

name: The King's Demons
desc: The English King is a shape-changing android called Kamelion.

name: The Five Doctors
desc: The Doctor is taken out of time and placed in the Death Zone on Gallifrey?

name: Warriors of the Deep
desc: The Silurians and Sea Devils provoke war to make them heirs to the planet.

name: The Awakening
desc: An ancient evil, the Malus, exists within the church at Little Hodcombe.

name: Frontios
desc: Something from Turlough's past is returning to destroy all life on Frontios.

name: Resurrection of the Daleks
desc: The Daleks plan to replace the High Council of the Time Lords with duplicates.

name: Planet of Fire
desc: On the planet Sarn the truth of Turlough's original exile is revealed.

name: The Caves of Androzani
desc: Sharaz Jek plots to return to power with the help of a corrupt industrialist.

name: The Twin Dilemma
desc: Mestor plans to use an explosion to spread his eggs throughout the universe.

name: Attack of the Cybermen
desc: The Cybermen plan to destroy Earth before their planet Mondas is destroyed.

name: Vengeance on Varos
desc: The population of Varos is entertained/controlled via violent TV shows.

name: The Mark of the Rani
desc: The Master and the Rani make an uneasy alliance on Earth.

name: The Two Doctors
desc: The Sixth Doctor must help his second incarnation changing into an Androgum.

name: Timelash
desc: The Doctor and Peri meet H.G. Wells and the evil Borad.

name: Revelation of the Daleks
desc: Davros calls himself the Great Healer but is really turning humans into Daleks.

name: The Trial of a Time Lord
desc: The Doctor is put on trial by the Time Lords but the court is not all it seems.

name: Time and the Rani
desc: The Rani has kidnapped geniuses from throughout time to power a giant brain.

name: Paradise Towers
desc: Paradise Towers is a tower block, with something terrible in the basement.

name: Delta and the Bannermen
desc: Evading the mercenary Bannermen, the Chimeron queen has fled to Earth.

name: Dragonfire
desc: Beneath the Iceworld Kane seeks the secret of the dragonfire.

name: Remembrance of the Daleks
desc: The Doctor and Ace are caught up in a battle between two factions of Daleks.

name: The Happiness Patrol
desc: On Terra Alpha everyone must be happy at all times or face the Kandyman.

name: Silver Nemesis
desc: Cybermen, neo-Nazis and time travellers all want to control the Nemesis Statue.

name: The Greatest Show in the Galaxy
desc: The Doctor takes Ace to visit the Psychic Circus on Segonax.

name: Battlefield
desc: Warriors from another dimension have come to Earth for one final battle.

name: Ghost Light
desc: Millennia ago, Light came to catalogue life. But while he slept, Earth evolved.

name: The Curse of Fenric
desc: The Doctor's old enemy, Fenric, seeks revenge.

name: Survival
desc: People have been transported to a strange planet on the verge of destruction.

name: Doctor Who
desc: A regenerated Doctor is chased by the Master through San Francisco in 1996.

name: Rose
desc: Rose Tyler meets the Doctor as he tries to stop the Nestene Consciousness.

name: The End of the World
desc: The Doctor takes Rose to the year 5-billion, to watch the Sun destroy the Earth.

name: The Unquiet Dead
desc: In 1869 Cardiff, Charles Dickens meets the walking dead.

name: Aliens of London
desc: Rose returns home a year late, and a spaceship crashes into Big Ben.

name: Dalek
desc: The Doctor and Rose stumble upon an underground alien museum in Utah, 2012.

name: The Long Game
desc: The Doctor, Rose and Adam arrive in the year 200,000 on a TV satellite.

name: Father's Day
desc: Rose tries to save her father from dying, and time unravels.

name: The Empty Child
desc: Rose investigates a child wearing a gasmask in WWII, and meets Jack Harkness.

name: Boom Town
desc: The Doctor, Rose and Captain Jack recharge the TARDIS on the Cardiff Rift.

name: Bad Wolf
desc: The Doctor and Rose wake up in deadly reality TV shows.

name: The Christmas Invasion
desc: The Doctor is regenerating, but the Sycorax are coming for Earth.

name: New Earth
desc: In the year 5-billion, humanity settles New Earth.

name: Tooth and Claw
desc: Werewolves trap Queen Victoria in the Torchwood house.

name: School Reunion
desc: Sarah Jane Smith investigates the Deffry Vale School with her rusty dog, K9.

name: The Girl in the Fireplace
desc: Madame de Pompadour finds the Versailles under attack by clockwork droids.

name: Rise of the Cybermen
desc: The Doctor, Rose and Mickey return to an alternate, facist version of 2007.

name: The Idiot's Lantern
desc: The people of 1953 Britain huddle round their TVs to watch the Coronation.

name: The Satan Pit
desc: Rose and the Doctor are trapped on a dangerous world orbitting a black hole.

name: Love & Monsters
desc: Elton is an ordinary man who joins LINDA to find the Doctor.

name: Fear Her
desc: The Doctor and Rose visit the 2012 London Olympics, but children are vanishing.

name: Army of Ghosts
desc: Ghosts appear around the Earth, and everyone but the Doctor and Rose accept it.

name: The Runaway Bride
desc: Donna is transported to the TARDIS on her wedding day, and meets the Doctor.

name: Smith and Jones
desc: Dr Jones and her hospital are kidnapped by a Judoon platoon upon the Moon.

name: The Shakespeare Code
desc: The Doctor and Martha meet Shakespeare, but the Carrionites threaten the world.

name: Gridlock
desc: While visiting New Earth, Martha gets kidnapped and stuck in traffic.

name: Daleks in Manhattan
desc: People are disappearing from 1930s Manhattan and pig men roam the sewers.

name: The Lazarus Experiment
desc: Martha's sister works for Professor Lazarus, who makes world-changing claims.
The crew of the Pentallian are burning alive as the ship is pulled into a star.

name: Human Nature
desc: A schoolteacher called John Smith dreams of adventures in time and space.

name: Blink
desc: Sally Sparrow is chased by the weeping angles.

name: Utopia
desc: Harry Saxon becomes Prime Minister and faces off with the Doctor.

name: Voyage of the Damned
desc: The interstellar cruise ship Titanic is set to crash into the Earth.

name: Partners in Crime
desc: Donna Noble searches for the Doctor and investigates Adipose Industries.

name: The Fires of Pompeii
desc: The Doctor takes Donna to Pompeii, on the day of the eruption of Mt. Vesuvius.

name: Planet of the Ood
desc: The Doctor and Donna find the icy homeworld of the Ood slave-race.

name: The Sontaran Stratagem
desc: The Sontarans plan to take over Earth through the Rattigan Academy and ATMOS.

name: The Doctor's Daughter
desc: Martha, Donna and the Doctor land on Messaline during a generations-old war.

name: The Unicorn and the Wasp
desc: The Doctor and Donna meet Agatha Christie at a party and a body turns up.

name: Silence in the Library
desc: The Doctor and Donna first meet River Song on a dead library planet.

name: Midnight
desc: On a planet where nothing can live, the Doctor faces a strange intelligence.

name: Turn Left
desc: Donna has her fortune read and the universe is in jeopardy.

name: The Stolen Earth
desc: The Daleks steal the Earth, and threaten the entire universe.

name: The Next Doctor
desc: The Doctor meets another Doctor and they face the CyberKing.

name: Planet of the Dead
desc: On a London bus on a desert planet, the Doctor faces the swarm.

name: The Waters of Mars
desc: Mars, 2059, Bowie Base One. Don't drink the water. Not one drop.

name: The End of Time
desc: Coming to the End of his life, the Master unleashes Hell on Earth.

name: The Eleventh Hour
desc: The Doctor meets Amy Pond. 12 years later they have 20 minutes to save Earth.

name: The Beast Below
desc: The Doctor takes Amy to the distant future, and Britian flying through space.

name: Victory of the Daleks
desc: The Doctor and Amy have to help Churchill stop the Daleks during WW2.

name: The Time of Angels
desc: The Weeping Angels chase the Doctor and his friends through a crashed spaceship.

name: The Vampires of Venice
desc: The Doctor takes Rory & Amy to 16th Venice, where young women are disappearing.

name: Amy's Choice
desc: Amy Pond slips back and forth between two worlds.

name: The Hungry Earth
desc: A drilling project in 2020 finds something unexpected under the Earth's crust.

name: Vincent and the Doctor
desc: The Doctor and Amy meet Vincent Van Gogh.

name: The Lodger
desc: The Doctor moves in with Craig, to investigate the second floor of his house.

name: The Pandorica Opens
desc: The Pandorica opens. The universe ends. Rory waits.

name: A Christmas Carol
desc: The Doctor must save a crashing spaceship, but what lurks in the fog?

name: The Impossible Astronaut
desc: The Doctor and co are invited to Lake Silencio, Utah, and then to 1969.

name: The Curse of the Black Spot
desc: A ghostly Siren stalks a 17th-century pirate ship.

name: The Doctor's Wife
desc: A Time Lord distress call lures the TARDIS to a junkyard in a bubble universe.

name: The Rebel Flesh
desc: Human-like industrial robots are treated poorly and rebel against their makers.

name: A Good Man Goes to War
desc: The Doctor's darkest hour as he declares war on those who kidnapped Amy.

name: Let's Kill Hitler
desc: Rory and Amy's best mate kidnap the TARDIS to kill Hitler (and the Doctor).

name: Night Terrors
desc: A little boy named George is scared of the monsters in his cupboard, so are we.

name: The Girl Who Waited
desc: The TARDIS lands at a quarantine facility for victims of an alien plague.

name: The God Complex
desc: The TARDIS arrives at a hotel where the guests battle their fears.

name: Closing Time
desc: The Cybermen invade a department store near Craig's house.

name: The Wedding of River Song
desc: The Doctor goes to Lake Silencio, Utah to learn why he must die.

name: The Doctor, the Widow and the Wardrobe
desc: An eccentric caretaker takes a WWI family on a wintery Christmas adventure.

name: Asylum of the Daleks
desc: The Daleks summon the Doctor, Amy and Rory to an ice planet.

name: Dinosaurs on a Spaceship
desc: A spaceship full of dinosaurs is on a collision path with Earth.

name: A Town Called Mercy
desc: The Doctor, Amy and Rory travel to the Old West and face a gunslinging cyborg.

name: The Power of Three
desc: The Doctor, Amy & Rory investigate small black cubes that have invaded Earth.

name: The Angels Take Manhattan
desc: In 1930s New York, the Doctor, Amy, Rory, and River and face the Weeping Angels.

name: The Snowmen
desc: The Doctor & Clara face sinister Doctor Simeon & an army of snowmen.

name: The Bells of Saint John
desc: The Doctor & Clara discover that the wifi is harvesting human minds.

name: The Rings of Akhaten
desc: The Doctor takes Clara to see the rings of Akhaten & the Festival of Offerings.

name: Cold War
desc: The Doctor and Clara land in a Russian nuclear submarine beneath the Arctic.

name: Hide
desc: The Doctor and Clara join paranormal investigators at a haunted house.

name: Journey to the Centre of the TARDIS
desc: After a crash, the Doctor has 30 minutes to find Clara and save the TARDIS.

name: The Crimson Horror
desc: In Victorian Yorkshire, the Doctor and Clara investigate corpses with red skin.

name: Nightmare in Silver
desc: Cybermen attack when the Doctor and Clara visit a themepark in space.

name: The Name of the Doctor
desc: Someone abducts the Doctor's friends, to lure him to Trenzalore.

name: The Day of the Doctor
desc: The Doctors face the destruction of Gallifrey.

name: The Time of the Doctor
desc: The universe's deadliest species are drawn to a mysterious message.

name: Deep Breath
desc: Clara helps a regenerated Doctor investigate a dinosaur in Victorian London.

name: Into the Dalek
desc: The Doctor must shrink and travel into the body of a moral Dalek.

name: Robot of Sherwood
desc: The Doctor takes Clara to see that Robin Hood doesn't exist.

name: Listen
desc: Clara learns what the Doctor fears, as he chases it to the end of the universe.

name: Time Heist
desc: The Doctor and company break into the most well-guarded bank in the universe.

name: The Caretaker
desc: The Doctor goes undercover at Clara's Coal Hill School to stop a killer robot.

name: Kill the Moon
desc: The Moon is falling apart in 2049, and Clara faces the hardest choice alone.

name: Mummy on the Orient Express
desc: An ancient mummy is killing passengers on the Orient Express in space.

name: Flatline
desc: Clara faces a 2D menace alone as the Doctor is trapped in a shrinking TARDIS.

name: In the Forest of the Night
desc: Over-night trees cover the Earth, and there is nothing the Doctor can do.

name: Dark Water
desc: The Doctor and Clara enter the Nethersphere, and Missy leads the Cybermen.

name: Last Christmas
desc: The Doctor & Clara face their last Christmas, trapped on an Arctic base.

name: The Magician's Apprentice
desc: Planes freeze in mid-air, Clara & Missy die, and the Doctor is trapped on Skaro.

name: Under the Lake
desc: Ghosts haunt an underwater base and the Fisher King threatens the universe.

name: The Girl Who Died
desc: The Doctor and Clara try to save Ashildr and her Viking village from the Mire.

name: The Woman Who Lived
desc: The Doctor faces the Knightmare, a 1651 highwayman with alien technology.

name: The Zygon Invasion
desc: The Zygon refuges on Earth begin a revolution to live in their true form.

name: Sleep No More
desc: The crew of the space station Le Verrier can't sleep.

name: Face the Raven
desc: Clara and the Doctor try to save a street artist with a countdown tattoo.

name: Heaven Sent
desc: In a tower surrounded by ocean, the Doctor faces the Veil to find Gallifrey.

name: Hell Bent
desc: The Doctor returns to Gallifrey to bring Clara back from the dead.

name: The Husbands of River Song
desc: River Song drags the Doctor into a chase across the galaxy.

name: The Return of Doctor Mysterio
desc: Nardole and a superhero called The Ghost combat brain-swapping aliens.

name: The Pilot
desc: The Doctor teaches a love-struck student.

name: Smile
desc: Smiling killer Robots defend a new human colony on a distant planet.

name: Thin Ice
desc: Something lurked beneathe the ice on the Thames in the winter of 1814.

name: Knock Knock
desc: Bill and her mates rent a suspiciously nice flat.

name: Oxygen
desc: A mining company in space decides air is expensive.

name: Extremis
desc: Bill and Nardol find out they are not real.

name: The Pyramid at the End of the World
desc: The monks invade Earth.

name: The Lie of the Land
desc: The monks have always ruled the Earth.

name: Empress of Mars
desc: Victorian Britain faces the Ice Queen on Mars.

name: The Eaters of Light
desc: The Doctor and Bill search for the Picts.

name: World Enough and Time
desc: Missy becomes the Doctor on a 400-mile-long spaceship escaping a blackhole.

name: Twice Upon a Time
desc: The Doctor never wants to go, but he can't find anyone to fight.

name: The Woman Who Fell to Earth
desc: The Doctor crashes in Sheffield, where a Stenza warrior is hunting humans.

name: The Ghost Monument
desc: The crew cross a ravaged planet to find the TARDIS they have never seen.

name: Rosa
desc: The Doctor meets Rosa Parks.

name: Arachnids in the UK
desc: Giant spiders attack Sheffield.

name: The Tsuranga Conundrum
desc: The crew is stuck on a self-destructing medical ship, under attack by a Pting.

name: Demons of the Punjab
desc: Yaz's grandma was on the Pakistan, India border during the Partisian in 1947.

name: Kerblam!
desc: The Doctor gets a message for help on a packaging slip in a Kerb!am gift box.

name: The Witchfinders
desc: The crew arrives in 17th century England, during a Witch Hunt.

name: It Takes You Away
desc: The Solitract is a lonely universe and it is reaching out for a friend.

name: The Battle of Ranskoor Av Kolos
desc: The Stenza warrior Tim Shaw has taken hold of the power of the Ux.

name: Resolution
desc: The most dangerous monster in the universe crashed on Earth 900 years ago.

name: Spyfall
desc: Spies all around the world are being mysteriously killed.

name: Orphan 55
desc: The team try to take a vacation on an idyllic vacation beach planet.

name: Nikola Tesla's Night of Terror
desc: Niola Tesla finds a small metal orb floating in the air.

name: Fugitive of the Judoon
desc: The Judoon take over a small British village looking for a viscious criminal.

name: Praxeus
desc: Mysterious viruses hit various places around the world simulataneously.

name: Can You Hear Me?
desc: Dreams haunt the team and come to life.

name: The Haunting of Villa Diodati
desc: Lord Byron and Mary Shelley are attacked by ghosts and skeletons.

name: The Timeless Children
desc: The Doctor and the team have to face the Cyber wars.
